questions.question: What is the predominant color of the vase, observed across its entire surface?

What material, based on its visual sheen and reflection, appears to comprise the vase?
Describe the surface texture visible, considering its light reflections and apparent smoothness?
Focusing on the rim, what is its distinct shape in relation to the main body?
What visual effect is present, where the color intensity subtly changes from top to bottom?

Considering the construction, how many visibly distinct parts constitute this item?
From the image, does the vase's base exhibit any visible decorative elements?
